question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. milk
B. container in the fridge
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The milk bottle is in the foreground on the right side of the open fridge door, while the container in the fridge is further inside on a shelf, making the milk visibly closer to the camera.
